get_latest_commit()

get_latest_commit

left_assign()

Check that left-assignment operators are used consistently throughout a package. "LEFT_ASSIGN" tokens can also be :=, so these must also be tallied, but are ignored. Left-assign operators are: ("=", "<-", "<<-", ":="). https://github.com/wch/r-source/blob/trunk/src/main/gram.y#L3283-L3290 https://github.com/wch/r-source/blob/trunk/src/main/gram.y#L3346-L3349

num_ex_lines()

Count number of example lines per function

pkg_has_contrib_md()

Check whether package has 'contributing.md', as well as whether it has a life cycle statement

pkg_uses_roxygen2()

Check whether all man files have been generated by 'roxygen2'

pkgrep_install_deps()

Install all system and package dependencies of an R package

pkgstats_data

Statistics on all CRAN packages from 'pkgstats'

process_gp()

process 'goodpractice' report

serve_api()

serve plumber API to report on packages

stats_checks()

Compare 'pkgstats' summary with statistics from all CRAN packages.
